assignments.name: Reassign_Clinic_and_Doctor

Flow.description: Creates a pathology request from the patient or cycle object. Is filterable for tests based on testtype variable.
Flow.label: New Pathology Request

fields.name: Errortext
fields.fieldText: There has been an error please report this to admin.

fields.name: activelink
fields.fieldText: This patient has currently active cycles. If you would like to link this request to an active cycle please select the cycle from the table below before proceeding. If you do not select a cycle it will just be linked to the patient record.

fields.name: ScanDateandTime
fields.fieldText: The below scan site, date and time information needs only to be filled if the scan is being undertaken offsite. You will be provided with the opportunity to book a nursing scan interview/onsite scan in the next window.

fields.name: SelectTests
fields.fieldText: Please select the pathology test you would like undertaken from the below table.
